short_summary: TBIPS contract notice for two level 2 B.1 business analysts, four level 3 B.1 business analyst and one level 3 B.7 architecture analyst
description: TBIPS contract notice for the provision of Level 2-3 business analyst services and Level 3 business transformation architect to support the Financial Systems and Training Directorate within Indigenous Services Canada
full_summary:

### Trade Agreements
The tender is open to bidders who have a valid bidder warranty under a freely negotiated contract with a government agency or under an international trade agreement.

- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
